name: Pentire Coastal Spritz 70cl
description: If you're looking for an alcohol-free spritz, Pentire has you covered! Coastal Spritz is created with blood orange, sea rosemary, and oak wood to keep it fresh, maritime, and gently bittersweet. Made in collaboration with bartenders, get this over ice with a good splash of soda, and a wedge of orange and bay leaf to garnish.

name: Pentire Adrift 70cl
description: Pentire Adrift is a glorious non-alcoholic botanical spirit made with ingredients found in North Cornwall. Native botanicals include rock samphire, sea fennel, sage, citrus and Cornish sea salt, either sustainably sourced or organically grown. A uniquely maritime spirit, great simply with tonic and a twist of lemon peel.To serve, fill a glass with ice, pour in 50ml of Pentire Adrift, top up with light tonic water, and garnish with rosemary.

name: Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% 70cl
description: Tanqueray Alcohol Free 0.0% features the same blend of botanicals used in Tanqueray London Dry Gin, but doesn't feature the alcohol! Produced using a secret distillation process, it manages to capture of junipery deliciousness of the spirit, meaning you can enjoy some marvellous drinks even if you're cutting back on alcohol.

name: Pentire Seaward 70cl
description: A fabulous non-alcoholic, botanical-based spirit from the Pentire range, made botanicals found in North Cornwall. The Seaward expression features the likes of sea rosemary, sea buckthorn, wild seaweed, imparting some maritime notes. Along with these ingredients, Seaward also features zesty hints of pink grapefruit and floral wafts of woodruff, making for a flavoursome and refreshing tipple. Serve with tonic and a whack of fresh grapefruit if you've got some to hand.To serve, fill a glass with ice, pour in 50ml of Pentire Seaward, top up with light tonic water, and garnish with a slice of fresh grapefruit.

name: Botivo 50cl
description: A non-alcoholic botanical aperitivo from Hertfordshire – ideal if you're rustling up some alcohol-free Spritzes! Botivo takes over a year to produce, hand blended in small batches, a combo of five raw ingredients are infused with aged British apple cider vinegar and balanced with organic wildflower honey. The likes of rosemary, wormwood, orange zest, gentian, and thyme combine to create a vibrant, bittersweet character that'll work a treat topped with elderflower tonic, or why not try it with apple soda?

name: Lyre's Non-Alcoholic White Cane Spirit 70cl
description: Lyre's non-alcoholic White Cane Spirit is made in the style of a white rum! It takes essences from sugar cane, oranges and various nuts, all bottled up for well rounded tipple that's totally free of alcohol. Just beware the mischievous looking monkey on the front of the bottle. He's most definitely up to no good.

name: Almave Ambar Non-Alcoholic Blue Agave Spirit 70cl
description: Almave Ambar Non-Alcoholic Blue Agave Spirit is the result of a collaboration between seven-time Formula One World Champion Lewis Hamilton co-founder and master distiller of Casa Lumbre, Iván Saldaña. The agave aficionado used his expertise to create a non-alcoholic alternative to Tequila, one made with a production process that omits the fermentation stage, but begins with Blue Agave from the Jalisco region, as all Tequila is made, and is distilled. Use this in your favourite Tequila cocktails to replace the spirit when you want something without booze.

name: Pentire Margarita 50cl
description: A ready-to-drink, alcohol-free take on the classic Margarita cocktail from Pentire! It's made with a selection of coastal botanicals, lime, agave, sea salt, and a dash of Mexican chilli for a zingy, zesty serve, simply pour over ice and enjoy!

name: Tarquin's Cornish Dry Non-Alcoholic Spirit 70cl
description: The team behind Tarquin's Cornish Dry Gin has been busy crafting this premium non-alcoholic spirit, distilled with a host of Cornish coastal botanicals, generous helpings of juniper, and fresh orange zest! Enjoy this mixed with tonic, garnished with red grapefruit and rosemary for a tasty, alcohol free alternative to a G&T.

name: Caleño Dark & Spicy 50cl
description: The Caleño range of non-alcoholic spirits was inspired by the vibrant flavours of Colombia, perfect if you're taking a break from booze but still want to drink something delicious. This particular expression from the collection is built around tangy, toasty notes of pineapple, black cardamom, coconut, ginger, lime, kola nut, and vanilla. Enjoy with over ice with soda and a good wedge of fresh lime.

name: Everleaf Forest 50cl
description: A fragrant and subtly floral non-alcoholic aperitif from the Everleaf folks! Everleaf Forest is made with the likes of saffron, vanilla, citrus blossom, gentian, and more, making for a tipple that offers up tasty flavours of the forest. Perfect for enjoying splashed in tonic water with a good wedge of fresh orange to garnish.

name: Everleaf Mountain 50cl
description: Everleaf Mountain offers up aromatic and fruity notes, having been made with the likes of cherry blossom, rosehip and strawberry. What it wasn't made with is alcohol! It's another fantastic non-alcoholic aperitif that you can enjoy if you're taking a break from booze but not from deliciousness. Pair with a good light tonic and pop in a few fresh strawberry slices for good measure.

name: Opius Rubedo Non-Alcoholic Bitter 50cl
description: Master distiller of Opius, Prof. Dr. Sas took inspiration from ancient alchemical archives to create this alcohol-free bitter orange elixir. It's ideal if you're crafting non-alcoholic takes on classic cocktails like Negronis, and makes a refreshing serve over ice, topped with tonic and a slice of orange.

name: Crossip Dandy Smoke 50cl
description: A decidedly smoky non-alcoholic spirit from Crossip, made with the likes of lapsang, pine, orange, ginger, and even liquid smoke essence! Will be fab served with cola, or for mixing up a non-alcoholic Sour cocktail...

name: Seedlip Grove 42 70cl
description: The range of non-alcoholic spirits from Seedlip has grown. Grove 42 is a citrus-focused expression featuring blood orange, bitter orange, mandarin, lemon, lemongrass and ginger - and no alcohol whatsoever! The producers recommend serving this tipple with soda water and orange peel, and we reckon it'll make for some interesting non-alcoholic twists on classic gin-based cocktails.

name: Glen Dochus Highland Blend 70cl
description: A premium non-alcoholic spirit, Glen Dochus Highland Blend is distilled from pure Deeside spring water and then reduced to 0% ABV to create a drink for big nights and better mornings. Sip this neat over ice, or try it in a low-alcohol take on some classic spirit-forward cocktails.

name: Lyre's Non-Alcoholic Dry London Spirit 70cl
description: The folks over at Lyre's in Australia have been rather busy creating this non-alcoholic Dry London Spirit, which if you hadn't guessed already, has been made in the style of a London Dry gin. Hence why the penguin on the label has a bowler hat and a monocle. Wait, does that explain why the penguin is dressed like people?

name: Crossip Pure Hibiscus 50cl
description: Inspired by Italian bitters and aperitifs, Crossip Pure Hibiscus is a fabulous non-alcoholic spirit that'll be perfect for Negroni cocktails and Spritzes without the booze. With notes of hibiscus, rhubarb, and orange, among more tasty herbs and spices, this is certain to make a host of brill cocktails.

name: Caleño Light & Zesty 50cl
description: Inspired by the vibrant flavours of Colombia, Caleño Light & Zesty is a lip-smacking non-alcoholic spirit featuring the likes of the Inca berry, coriander, green cardamom, juniper, papaya, pineapple, and lemon peel. You'll want to serve this over ice with tonic water and a fresh Inca berry for garnish if you've got one to hand.

name: Crossip Fresh Citrus 50cl
description: A decidedly citrusy expression from the Crossip non-alcoholic spirit range, featuring the likes of mandarin, lemon, grapefruit, clementine, and orange, alongside Crossip's core botanicals. We'll be intrigued to see the fab non-alcoholic cocktails you come up with using this one, though the producer does say it's great for a Mojito or Cosmo, so perhaps that'll give you a good starting point...

name: William Fox Pine Syrup 75cl
description: Pine is no longer just for forest foragers. There’s an easier way to get it into your drinks, courtesy of Liverpool-based William Fox Drinks! From whisky coolers to vodka sours, get creative and sub out your plain syrup for an aromatic taste of the forest.Please note: Once opened, use your tasty William Fox syrup within a month.

name: Quarter Proof Blanco Agave Spirit 70cl
description: Quarter Proof Blanco Agave Spirit is a Tequila alternative crafted with 100% agave, featuring a lower alcohol content at 15% ABV. It retains full flavour through a process called fractionation, which ensures a rich, authentic taste with less intensity. This vegan, gluten-free alternative was distilled in the UK and is perfect for lighter takes on cocktails like Margaritas.

name: Citizen Spritz Passion Fruit - Alcohol-Free Instant Spritz Mix 50cl
description: A passion fruit non-alcoholic spritz for those who love a Pornstar Martini but don't want the booziness. Made with passion fruit juice and natural flavourings, simply top this up with soda water and enjoy a sweet and sharp spritz.

name: Quarter Proof London Dry Spirit 70cl
description: Quarter Proof London Dry is a gin alternative with a lower alcohol content at 15% ABV. The idea is to still give you the full flavour of traditional London Dry gin, with a blend of juniper, sweet orange, and angelica. Ideal for mixing in cocktails like a G&T or Negroni, it provides a lighter option without compromising on taste. It's vegan, gluten-free, and distilled in the UK.

name: Whitley Neill Rhubarb & Ginger Alcohol Free 70cl
description: An alcohol-free creation from Whitley Neill, packing in the flavours of rhubarb and ginger! The tried and tested flavour is the star of one of Whitley Neill's most popular gins, and now the tart, spicy duo has been harnessed once more to be enjoyed at 0% ABV. Sure to be refreshing with tonic or warm your cockles with hot apple juice.

name: Seedlip Garden 108 70cl
description: A herbaceous non-alcoholic spirit from the Seedlip range. Somewhat similar to gin, Seedlip's inventive expressions are based around the distilled non-alcoholic remedies found in The Art of Distilling (written in 1651), made using copper stills and careful selections of botanicals, but no alcohol whatsoever. Seedlip Garden 108 is made with hay, pea, rosemary, spearmint, and thyme. Try Seedlip Garden 108 with elderflower tonic, served over ice with a cucumber ribbon.

name: Sixtowns Alcohol Free Blueberry & Wild Strawberry 70cl
description: This vibrant alcohol free spirit from Stoke on Trent's Sixtowns was created to make a characterful alternative to gin. Built upon the flavours of sweet blueberries and tart wild strawberries, with delicate botanical balance, enjoy this with tonic and some fresh berries for garnish, or shake up some characterful non-alcoholic cocktails.

name: Saicho Darjeeling 75cl
description: The Saicho range is packed full of cold-brewed sparkling teas, and they are perfect for pairing with food as you would do a wine. This particular edition has been made using Darjeeling tea from the foothills of the Himalayas. With its subtle fruity notes and hints of savoury herbs balancing it out, it'll go wonderfully with pasta dishes.

name: Citizen Spritz Cool Lime - Alcohol-Free Instant Spritz Mix 50cl
description: A Mojito-inspired non-alcoholic spritz from Citizen Spritz here made using agave syrup and natural flavourings to bring those refreshing mint and lime flavours you know and love. You can pair Cool Lime with soda water and ice for an easy, delicious serve.

name: Oddbird GSM 75cl
description: An alcohol free French red wine from Oddbird, made in the southern Saint-Chinian from the 2020 grape harvest. Grenache, syrah, mourvedre, and carignan grapes create layers of vibrant red fruits, earthy dark fruit, and tannic acidity, with a drying finish that ought to make it an exciting non alcoholic option at dinnertime.
